game.name: Moominvalley VR
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Journey through forests, misty mountains, open seas, and a storm-swept islands with its lighthousse in this magical VR adventure. Explore with Moomintroll, Snufkin, and friends, solving playful puzzles and uncovering moments of humor, warmth, and Nordic wonder.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Journey through forests, misty mountains, open seas, and a storm-swept islands with its lighthousse in this magical VR adventure. Explore with Moomintroll, Snufkin, and friends, solving playful puzzles and uncovering moments of humor, warmth, and Nordic wonder.
